title: Bug 49536: Accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when no webapps are deployed
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content, instead of an expected HTTP error 404 response.
OB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and access a URL, it returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content.
EB: I expect that when no webapps are deployed and a URL is accessed, the system should return a HTTP error 404 response.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
2. Access a URL.
3. Observe the returned HTTP response code and content.
